item.description: Traffic; INC#0329; 08:00AM; 21400 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KaK61q; Woodland Hills; Two vehicle collision with three patients being transported: 1 in critical condition (35yo female) and two in serious condition (57 yo male, 66yo female) One vehicle was on fire (now extinguished). There was no entrapment. CHP Log# 491. No further details.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E305 E72 E84 RA105 RA84 RA872 T105; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1717; 09:50PM; 1341 W 84th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ji9TLN; #VermontKnolls; It took 32 firefighters 13 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames inside of a one-story single-family home. No reported injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E21 E233 E266 E57 E66 EM13 RA257 RA57 RA857 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1717; 09:37PM; 1341 W 84th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ji9TLN; #VermontKnolls; One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E57 E66 RA257 RA857 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0202; 04:44AM; 7760 N Independence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BPQGYk; #CanogaPark; Firefighters coordinated rooftop ventilation with interior fire attack to strategically eliminate the flames consuming the living space and attic of the home. It took 31 firefighters 39 minutes to extinguish the fire. No reported injuries. ; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E296 E305 E72 E84 EM17 RA104 RA106 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0202; 04:05AM; 7760 N Independence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BPQGYk; #CanogaPark; Single family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E296 E305 E72 E84 EM17 RA104 RA106 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1008; 02:19PM; 5707 W Harold Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FFLhEq; #Hollywood; It took 30 firefighters 13 minutes (2:32pm) to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one top-floor unit of a 3-story apartment building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E82 RA41 RA52 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 1; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0950; 01:51PM; 333 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PHDo64; #Koreatown; It took 18 firefighters 21 minutes (2:12pm) to locate and extinguish a small fire in one bathroom of a 4-story modern apartment building. Two children (7-yo female, 8-yo male) were evaluated for possible smoke inhalation, but not transported. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E229 E29 E52 RA29 T29; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0941; 02:03PM; 704 N Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YBCJHm; #Chinatown; It took 35 firefighters 19 minutes to confine the fire to the first floor unit of a two-unit residential building and extinguish the flames. Only smoke damage affected the upstairs unit. One 57-year-old male was transported in fair condition with smoke-related medical complaints. No other injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E201 E203 E220 E9 EM1 RA17 RA2 RA803 T1 T20 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0941; 01:44PM; 704 N Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YBCJHm; #Chinatown; Two-story apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E201 E203 E220 E9 RA2 RA803 T1 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0700; 11:43AM; 4912 N Libbit Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PFyshJ; #Encino; It took 20 firefighters 15 minutes to extinguish fire in the attached garage and attic of a one-story single-family home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E288 E293 E39 RA88 T88 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
